title: Skomet Multi-angle adjustable Phone stand, iPhone stand, cradle, dock, holder iPhone 7 6 6s plus 5 5s 5c charging and Android smartphone devices - Silver

★ RISK FREE PURCHASE: Buy with Confidence. We've got you covered with our no risk MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If for any reason you are not satisfied, contact us for a full refund or replacement.
description: The Skomet phone stand is exactly what you have been looking for! An amazing accessory to your device. ►Adjustable viewing angles for your viewing pleasure ►When you put iPhone 7/ 7 Plus (without case) on this stand, the viewing angle could be adjusted from 40 to 45 degrees, which is suitable for your multiple demand of viewing. ►Compatible with all Mobile Phones, E-Readers and most Tablets (up to 10.1 inch), even with the heavy duty case on. ►You may need 3 stands to meet different demands: One on your desk on check emails, one on your bedside table to enjoy movies and one in the kitchen to enjoy the personal life. ►The generous and simple design makes it fit for totally different occasions. ►Very stable for iPad mini, iPad Air and iPad Pro 9.7 inch Ideal for FaceTime or Skype video calls ►Follow the recipes in your kitchen without worrying about spills damaging your device. ►Adjustable cell phone stands ►Desktop Cell Phone Stand Tablet Stand ►Thickness Aluminum Stand Holder for Mobile Phone ►Risk free purchase ►Colors: Black, Gold, Red, Silver, Clay Purple and Rose Gold
